response.overview: A story centered around an Indian family who moves to France and opens a restaurant across the street from a Michelin-starred French restaurant.
response.tagline: Life's greatest journey begins with the first step.
response.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey

titles.title: From Bombay to Paris: The Hundred-Foot Journey
Madame Mallory e il piccolo chef indiano

crew.name: Mark Graziano
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production
